mapper.select: SELECT emp_id, username, password, position_id, dept_id, section_id, role_id, status_code, img_src FROM tbl_user WHERE username COLLATE utf8mb4_bin = #{username}

SELECT users.emp_id, users.username, users.status_code, users.img_src, users.password, info_master.fname, info_master.mname, info_master.lname, position_master.position_name, position_master.position_id, info_master.email, section_master.section_id, section_master.section_name, department_master.dept_id, department_master.dept_name, user_status.status_name, users.del_flag, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT COALESCE(projects.proj_name, '')) AS proj_name_string, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT COALESCE(role_master.role_user_level, '')) AS role_user_level_string, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT COALESCE(role_master.title, '')) AS user_multi_role_string FROM tbl_personal_info AS info_master INNER JOIN tbl_user AS users ON users.emp_id = info_master.emp_id LEFT JOIN tbl_multi_role AS multi_role ON users.emp_id = multi_role.emp_id LEFT JOIN tbl_role_mst AS role_master ON multi_role.role_id = role_master.role_id INNER JOIN tbl_position_mst AS position_master ON users.position_id = position_master.position_id INNER JOIN tbl_section_mst AS section_master ON users.section_id = section_master.section_id INNER JOIN tbl_department_mst AS department_master ON users.dept_id = department_master.dept_id INNER JOIN tbl_status_mst AS user_status ON users.status_code = user_status.status_code LEFT JOIN tbl_user_project AS tup ON tup.emp_id = info_master.emp_id LEFT JOIN tbl_proj_manager AS tpm ON tpm.emp_id = info_master.emp_id LEFT JOIN tbl_project_mst AS projects ON projects.proj_id = tup.proj_id OR projects.proj_id = tpm.proj_id WHERE users.del_flag = 0 AND users.emp_id = #{id} GROUP BY users.emp_id, users.username, users.status_code, users.img_src, users.password, info_master.fname, info_master.mname, info_master.lname, position_master.position_name, position_master.position_id, info_master.email, section_master.section_id, section_master.section_name, department_master.dept_id, department_master.dept_name, users.del_flag;
